value:
$bEvBg_Chapter3_BraveInside|$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|The day Hel invaded the realm of life,
I was helpless to stop her.$k$pMine is the power to grant life...$k$pHel, on the other hand, took the lives
of all those she encountered, showing
mercy to nothing and no one.$k$pI wanted to save everyone that
I could, any way I was able, and so
I gathered their souls, and I...$k$pI hid them in you, Eir.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|In me? What does that mean?$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|As a member of the realm of life's
royal family, you are able to carry
a great number of lives.$k$pBut when Hel attacked, you were still
very young, and you held only one
life within you.$k$pAnd so...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Then all the many lives I had were...$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Yes. Those lives were the lives
of what was once your realm—
the realm of life.$k$pAs long as you lived, I thought, those
souls could be released again, and
the realm of life could be rebuilt.$k$pThat is why I did what I did. But then
Hel learned of my plans.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Because of what I did, you suffered
the pain of death after death at the
hands of Hel...$k$pI am...so very sorry, Eir.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|There is no need to apologize...
You were only trying to save the
realm of life, weren't you?$k$pGanglöt was able to take my life
due to my own weakness. You have
nothing to atone for...$k$pAnd what's more is that you
sacrificed your life, for me.$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|You are such a kind, gentle soul, Eir...
I was able to keep you among the
living, so I regret nothing.$k$pI do, however, have one request
to ask of you...$k$p

$bEvBg_Chapter3_BraveInside|$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|What can I do? Tell me, and I will
do anything you ask.$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Thank you. You should know, though,
that it may unearth painful memories
from your past.$k$pAs Hel took the lives held within you,
they were released into the realm of
the dead.$k$pNow, they wander there, lost. I need
you to gather them.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|The lives of all the denizens from
the realm of the living? My...lives?$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Yes. I hoped to gather them and
return them to their lives in our
home realm, to resurrect it. Alas...$k$pIn light of all this, please, will you
do what I could not?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Yes. Of course, Ymir. Anything.$k$pAlthough I have no memory of it,
the realm of the living is my home.
You said I was...its princess?$k$pIf that is true, then it is my duty,
and I will see it through.$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|You have grown so very strong, Eir...$k$pTo think that the tiny baby I knew
back then has grown so...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Y-you knew me from when I was
that young? When I was a baby?$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Of course! Why, there were even
times when I changed your diap—$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I-I understand! Th...that's quite
enough. I believe you.$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|There's no need to be embarrassed!
You were so very cute back then...$k$pThe day you were born was warm
and particularly beautiful—as if
your arrival was already a blessing.$k$pI could not wait to see you when
I heard, and I rushed to the castle
to meet you.$k$pThe king and queen beamed down,
looking over you with such love...
I will never forget it.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|I would carry you on my walks
in the forest.$k$pYou would giggle whenever I made
the flowers around us bloom. That
little giggle brought me such joy...$k$pI would put the forest into full bloom
before I knew it...$k$pNot everyone was pleased with that...
Hee hee!$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Ah... Hee hee!$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|There's that giggle I remember.
You may be grown now, but that
laugh of yours has not changed.$k$pI want for you to live a life full
of such laughter. The worlds
should not be deprived.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I am unsure how... I'm not even sure
why I laughed just now.$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Don't worry. I will help you to laugh.$k$pI'll show you beautiful, joyous things
all throughout the many worlds.$k$pBut first, I must show you to where
the lost dead of our realm wander.$k$pAs long as we keep our distance
from Hel's castle, Ganglöt will not
detect our presence, so don't worry.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Then let us depart...$k$pOnce more, I return to the realm
of the dead...but what is this feeling?$k$pIs this...fear? Or...$k$p

$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|Phew... Now seems like an opportune
moment for a rest. There are so few
chances around here...$k$pCurious that the people of this world
seem to have the time and resources
to enjoy such festivals...$k$pIs this what it would be like to live in
a time of peace? I could put my spy
life to an end, and Matthew and I—$k$pEep!$k$p$WmMPID_マシュー,ch03_02_Matthew_M_Normal,Face|Oh! Hello. Sorry about that. I was
just looking for someone, and—$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|Oh, Matthew!$k$pI was just thinking about you.
You know...$k$p$WmMPID_マシュー,ch03_02_Matthew_M_Normal,Face|Hm? Have we...met?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|What? Matthew. It's me. Don't you
recognize me?$k$p$WmMPID_マシュー,ch03_02_Matthew_M_Normal,Face|Oh! I get it. Nice try, but this little
trick of yours won't work on me!$k$pMy heart already belongs to someone
else, I'm afraid...$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|Ugh! Fine! See if I care!$k$p$WmMPID_マシュー,ch03_02_Matthew_M_Normal,Face|Huh? Where's she off to in such
a hurry?$k$p

$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|*sigh* I knew he didn't have an eye
for the finer details, but still...$k$pI can't believe he didn't recognize
me just because I changed my
clothes and put on a mask...$k$pI'm questioning everything!$k$p$WmMPID_マシュー,ch03_02_Matthew_M_Normal,Face|Oh! There you are! You...ARE Leila,
aren't you?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|I don't know! Am I? How can you
know for sure? Do I LOOK like Leila?$k$p$WmMPID_マシュー,ch03_02_Matthew_M_Normal,Face|Don't be like that. Earlier, I just...$k$pI just couldn't believe my eyes!
You were so beautiful!$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|Really... How convenient!$k$pYou are an even bigger fool than
I thought if you believe that will
earn you forgiveness.$k$p$WmMPID_マシュー,ch03_02_Matthew_M_Normal,Face|What? Then...what can I do?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|Hmmm...$k$pI suppose you'll just have to bring
me something shiny to help me
feel better.$k$pThat's what this festival is all about!$k$p$WmMPID_マシュー,ch03_02_Matthew_M_Normal,Face|Something shiny, hm? Like what?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|It's part of your job figure that out!
Now get going!$k$p$WmMPID_マシュー,ch03_02_Matthew_M_Normal,Face|Wow. Merciless!$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|Prove to me your talent as a thief
outweighs your lack of attention
to detail!$k$p...Steal my heart, if you will.$k$p
